Grasp Check
Why did the tennis ball appear to be going straight up and down at the same time that it moved along a curved path?

The idea that a description of motion depends on the reference frame of the observer has been known for hundreds of years. The 17th-century astronomer Galileo Galilei [link] was one o

Tips for Success!
In some books x or s is used instead of d to describe position. In addition, a subscript is sometimes used to describe horizontal position, dx, or vertical position, dy.Rice Link
